contents.projectsDescriptionPartTwo: tarafindan kurulmustur. Sapplink'in misyonu tasarladigi uygulamalari A dan Z ye gelistirmektir. Grafik UX/UI tasarim, sistem mimari planlamasi, veri akisi organizasyonu, ve iOS/web uygulamalarinin gelismesine odaklanmistir. Sapplink, simdilik kendi kisisel proje portfoyunu ihtiva etmektedir, fakat projelerini ileride harici istemcilere geni≈ületmeyi planlƒ±yor.

clientelle.utefa: University of Toronto Engineers Finance Association

references.rijuVashishtReference: "Marc Atasoy is an extremely talented professional with vast skill in Angular and software development. His knowledge and awareness of best development practices might only be surpassed by his communication and team building skills. It was a pleasure to work with and learn from Marc."
references.kannanMuthiah: - Kannan Muthiah, IT Commercial Lines Manager @ Intact
references.kannanMuthiahReference: "Marc has been exceptional and superbly reliable in delivering full-sized application features, as well as fixing critical production issues in a quick fashion. His care for quality is superceded by his positive energy."
references.cenkSayinReference: "One can always rely on Marc to complete any task with excellence. His character really is very hard to come by."
references.daniyalAdeelReference: "As the Vice President of UTEFA, Marc took great responsibility in helping run the association. I had trust that along the way, at ony point if I needed anything, I could ask for Marc's assistance, and he would be there. He was also exceptional in running the quantitative team, hosting learning sessions, leading analysts and developers, as well as creating and running a year-long UI / ML fintech project!"

aboutPage.about1: Istanbul'da dogan Kanada'li Marc Atasoy, University of Toronto da muhendislik okumaktadir. Endustri Muhendisliginde uzmanligini Yoneylem Arastirmasinda yapmaktadir, ve ikincil olarak Yapay Zeka okurken, ayni zamanda da Muhendislik Ticaret Sertifikasi elde etmistir.
aboutPage.about2: 6 yildir HTML5/CSS ile, 5 yildir Python ve Java ile, 4 yildir SQL ile, ve de 2 yildir Yapay Zeka ile calisan Marc Merih, ayni zamanda profesyonel olarak ile 1.5 yildir Angular / HTML / CSS ile calismisligi vardir. Ilgi alani sistem mimarisi tasarƒ±mƒ±nda optimizasyon, ve iOS uygulamalari ve tasarimlari gelistirmektir.
